attributes.action: Admit this Government are wholly responsible for the reasons why thousands of indigenous Brits are leaving their ancestral homeland for a better quality of life elsewhere.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Labour have completely destroyed this country. They have thrown open our borders allowing terrorists from other lands to bring their lawless ways here. We now have guns, knives and even suicide bombers in our midst. 

We see homeless and begging in our streets, while the newcomers are given instant housing.  

You are allowing ‘out of place’ mosques to be built everywhere, and have even ‘sneakily’ allowed Sharia Law to happen in some parts of the country. Please stop appeasing to the Muslim minority, and ignoring the majority of 'indigenous' Brits. 

We are deeply sad and depressed to see this once great country being destroyed, and it‘s all down to this PC Government that have allowed this to happen.
